title: Is streaming content taking over the internet? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sure. It’s mostly about bandwidth. DVDs have about 10 Mbit/s bitrate, so if you have a 10 Mbit/s+ unlimited connection, you don’t need a DVD player anymore. Even less speed is required for music. Next step is pure online gaming, i.e. when you just need a screen and some kind of input device and all the heavy workload is performed offsite. As for taking over the internet, if you mean resource consumption, video content is the king.
Streaming services have been the biggest user of Internet bandwidth for years. There are several reports about how much Netflix alone uses.
